name: BeeJam
description:
BeeJam is a 2D hack n’ slash game in which Bee, the pollen knight, faces cursed flora who have invaded his home. Bee's main objective is to cure the flowers with his purifying stinger in order to restore the balance of nature.

Welcome to my first shot at a gamejam! It may not be entirely all I wanted it to be since college took up most of my time until near the end of May but I had a lot of fun making this project and joining in on the Itch.io community.

Controls: WASD or arrow keys to move and SPACE to attack.

All character and enemy sprites designed by Robyn: https://opengameart.org/users/robyn

Map assets provided from ArMM1998: https://opengameart.org/content/zelda-like-tilesets-and-sprites
